A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: it is a good movie. Great plot all the way through. but I fails on the acting ( not kilo ren he was great ) and scripting. The mood was totally off. The drama is gone. I am not saying it is a bad movie\,it isn't\, but it is not the same type movie episodes the originals are. If you are going into this movie for the first time don't expect a star wars movie expect a disney movie with all your favorite characters all squished together. It will make the experience more enjoyable and less jarring.
